reviewText: i don't know what else to say just that i like the movie it is what i was hopping for..

I've been a fan since I was a little boy, I always wanted to own the figures, and I was always looking for the episodes on the internet, so when i came across them here I was very unsure whether or not to buy them, since i didn't wanted to be disappointed, but in the end i did, and it was one of my best purchases online I ever did, YES the video and audio quality may not be the best, but its the same one i grew up watching so it brings a lot of memories back. you must keep in mind that these are the original series, and they were made back in the late 80's and early 90's so if you do remember right VIDEO and AUDIO quality back then wasn't the best, maybe they could of done a better job, but in my opinion enough is enough, but maybe for the later generations is not enough, in the end I'm a very happy customer, and a very happy saint seiya fan.
para todos los fanaticos de saint seiya no recomiendo que lo compren no se ve muy bien parece que lo descargaron del internet y nada mas se puede ver en español no tiene audio japones

The Saint Seiya series deserve five stars but this dvd doesn't.  It has very low image quality and not all dvd players can play it.  It looks like someone copied it from the internet or vhs.  I would recommend looking for a more original version.

This dvd gives you the entire sanctuary saga!!You get to see  saint seiya and the rest of the knights of the zodiac do battle in the 12 palaces, Againts all 12 Gold saints! This dvd is action packed with ''Drama'' and a very good story that get's addictive!! A must have for any true saint seiya fan!!
